name: cypress-split
description: Split Cypress specs across parallel CI machines for speed

scripts.user-specs: DEBUG=cypress-split,find-cypress-specs SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=0 cypress run --config-file examples/user-spec-pattern.config.js
scripts.subfolder: DEBUG=cypress-split,find-cypress-specs SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=0 cypress run --config-file examples/my-app/tests/cypress.config.js
scripts.timings: DEBUG=cypress-split SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=0 SPLIT_FILE=timings.json cypress run
scripts.timings-no-file: DEBUG=cypress-split SPLIT=1 SPLIT_INDEX=0 SPLIT_FILE=does-not-exist.json cypress run
scripts.timings-split-output-file: DEBUG=cypress-split SPLIT=2 SPLIT_INDEX=0 SPLIT_OUTPUT_FILE=new-timings.json SPLIT_FILE=timings.json cypress run

author: Gleb Bahmutov <gleb.bahmutov@gmail.com>
